Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Expands the definition of "public body"
Summary: Relates to expanding the definition of "public body" to include any entity consisting of two or more members created by executive order of the governor.
LawCode: Amd ยง102, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the definition of a "public body"
